name: Accessibility checklist
description: About the templateLooking to ensure that your product is accessible and usable for all users? This template has been designed to guide product designers through the process of creating products that are accessible to users with visual, auditory, motor, or cognitive disabilities.This template covers a range of considerations that should be taken into account throughout the design process, including typography and color choices, navigation and structure, buttons and links, and forms and controls.
features: After purchasing the template, you will be redirected to Notion.; Click on the "Duplicate" button located in the top right corner. This will duplicate the template to your Notion workspace.; Congratulations! You can now start using the template and make all the adjusments needed to fit your needs.
